author: KIT-CMS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the RelVal Workflow for TauEmbedding mentioned here https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44896
In addition, RelVal Workflows for all Run 2 Eras are added.

#### PR validation:

Workflows were validated locally. The 139.02 workflow does not work yet, the required RAW sample (`/DoubleMuon/Run2016H-v1/RAW`) is only on tape and is currently still transferred to disk (should be done in the next hours, https://cms-rucio-webui.cern.ch/rule?rule_id=746e43e208294ac5a82b184d4deb1110)
title: Fix relval embedding workflows
